Based on your preferences, I would recommend the movie "The Trouble With Harry". This film is a contemporary quest story set in end--of-millennium Britain and continental Europe. It asks what humanity has made of Prometheus' gift of fire - energy, technology, expertise, but also destruction, pollution and war.
Another recommendation could be "Prometheus" (2012). This film is an epic science fiction adventure film directed by Christopher Nolan and starring Sam Worthington, Mia Wasilla, Idris Elba, James Marsden, William Devane, Geoffrey Rush, Sigourney Weaver. The film follows the story of a man named Prometheus who has been sentenced to death for stealing fire from the gods. However, as he is being executed, Prometheus manages to escape and leave behind the secret of how fire was created.
